MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the FK6 postcode area of Denny. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 3.47pm. Our team has managed to restore power to a number of properties in the area and are still working to a faulty underground cable fault in Hunter Gardens affecting the rest of our customers without power. We now expect all power to be back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:33PM on Thursday 31 December 2020.
